introduction: Hello, I'm Patrick, an experienced Full Stack Developer with a strong focus on the JavaScript ecosystem, specializing in building scalable and performant web applications using React and Next.js. Over the years, I have honed my skills in JavaScript, mastering essential frameworks and libraries for modern web development. My expertise in React and Next.js enables me to deliver dynamic, SEO-friendly websites that provide excellent user experiences and meet the high standards of today's web applications.

My professional journey has been dedicated to developing robust solutions, optimizing web performance, and integrating advanced features that ensure minimal maintenance and high efficiency. Whether enhancing existing applications or building new ones from the ground up, my goal is always to leverage my technical skills to produce cutting-edge, accessible, and easy-to-maintain web platforms. My projects often involve a comprehensive approach, from initial concept and design to final deployment and maintenance.

Beyond my technical skills, I am deeply committed to staying updated with the latest trends and best practices in web development. This continuous learning ensures that I can offer innovative solutions that are not only effective but also future-proof. I believe in the power of collaboration and strive to build strong relationships with my clients, understanding their needs and delivering results that drive success.

header.title: Explore All My Projects
header.description: Discover in this gallery all the projects I have worked on. From e-commerce to school projects and side projects, you will find a wide range of web applications that I have developed or contributed to.

projects.title: M. Moustache
projects.description: During my internship and apprenticeship at W3lead, I was responsible for front-end development on the Shopify platform for M. Moustache. My tasks included website integration, development of a gift card API, and implementation of a Point of Sale (POS) system. These roles allowed me to enhance my skills in both front-end integration and backend API development, focusing on creating efficient, secure online shopping experiences.

projects.title: Tartine & Chocolat
projects.description: As part of my apprenticeship, I focused on integrating and developing an API to connect an ERP system with the Tartine & Chocolat website for in-store pre-orders and displaying available stores. This project enhanced my ability to handle both front-end integration and backend systems in a real-world e-commerce setting.

projects.title: Qwetch
projects.description: My main responsibilities at Qwetch included website integration and implementing Trustpilot widgets. I also worked on the redesign of Shopify's Checkout V2, improving user experience and transaction efficiency during my ongoing apprenticeship.

projects.title: Le -1Store
projects.description: My role in Le -1Store involved front-end development similar to the tasks I performed for Easy Clothes, focusing on enhancing the website's user interface and integrating essential e-commerce functionalities to support online operations effectively.

projects.title: BAP ChÃ¢tenay-Malabry
projects.description: For this academic project, I developed a full-stack solution aimed at enhancing HR processes to detect professional burnout. The solution included an interactive dashboard that aggregates data from user responses, offering insights and actionable steps for potential professional burnout situations.

projects.title: React NBA
projects.description: In this school project aimed at creating a sports betting app for NBA games, I was responsible for backend development, focusing on data security and user authentication to ensure a safe and reliable betting environment.

projects.title: Marshall Motors
projects.description: As a frontend developer for the Marshall Motors project, I was tasked with integrating the website for a garage specializing in vintage car renovations, providing a sleek, user-friendly interface that reflects the quality of the garage's services.

projects.title: Technical City Shopify
projects.description: In this role, I conducted technical proof of concepts and mini-projects to explore and demonstrate Shopify's latest updates. Working closely with my mentor during my apprenticeship at W3lead, I developed new features for Shopify's V2 checkout and other functionalities, primarily using Rust and React alongside Shopify APIs.
